item.description:
Women's Group: On Relating to Men

Learn what men want, what they are capable of, what their complaints are, what they admire in women, how to relate to men effectively. Understand male psychology and how to influence men in a positive way.

7-9:30pm
Cost: $40, slding scale to $20

Herb Pearce has been teaching gender and communication courses for decades. A group just for women to find out what men really want and don't have the words to tell you. Herb is a relationship coach and therapist for individuals and couples. He teaches workshops on the Enneagram and Myers-Briggs, personal and spiritual development.

www.herbpearce.comwww.herbpearce.com
for info on upcoming workshops and to sign up for his weekly email newsletter
item.name: Women's Group: On Relating to Men
